lyā eva | athavā suratāṃte yāvan na mukulāyante nayanāni strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ vā | tāvad eṣā vibhramā | paścān na tad evaṃ |
athavā vigato bhramaḥ vibhramaḥ etāvatā matayor virājaṃte cyutau jātāyāṃ na kim api | ayam āśayaḥ | yan nāgarisaṃrike

div.p:
navaphalikām ātmanaḥ kiṃ nna prā
rthayase | prārthayasi kurubakasya | etat khalu hasati tvāṃ | subhava valitamukhapaṃkajaṃ jāyā | kurubakataror nava
phalikāṃ kiṃ yācase | etāvatā tvam evāsmākaṃ navaphalikā prāyo netrayoḥ | yato valitamukhapaṃkajaṃ yathā bhavati
tathā hasati | asyāḥ śirasi nyastā kunarubakapuṣpāṇi paśya | pūrvam iyaṃ gatā | tadanu tvaṃ | valitamukhapaṃkajaṃ padaṃ sā
rthakam eva hasati ko hetuḥ | svātmany upakarṣamānatayā param upahasati | nāyaṃ dhanyo 'haṃ dhanyo || pūrvaṃ nāgataḥ | athavā
vidaghdo navasa.mgam ekasya ceto na savalati | nāgato 'smadbhītyā tvām iti hasati | nūtanaphalaṃ navaphalikety ucyate
'bhidhāne | dvitīyapakṣe | kuruvakanavaphalikāṃ kiṃ na yācase | ātmano navaphalaṃ kiṃ na yācase | yeyaṃ mama sakhī tava
phalaṃ dhāvayiṣyatīty tava purastāt valitamukhapaṃkajaṃ lajjayādya hasati | paśya dvitīyapakṣe jāyāśabdo | nauci
tyāt tajjāyā jāyā bhavati | tad asyāṃ jāyate punaḥ | jāyāśabdaḥo prasūtāyām eva tvayā tu prathamaṃ aucityam uktaṃ satyam eva syā
